name: Waffle Crisp Cereal
description: Really good use of that sadly discontinued waffle. 1-2 drops per 30 ml is plenty. For those that have a little left, try this simple mix! 27 works with so many things, and this is a perfect pairing.
author: coop34

reviews.text: Luckily I still have about 25mls of INW Waffle and I am glad I do because this is a super tasty recipe. The waffle comes through very well at 0.1%. Your cereal and milk/cream base blend well into the mix too.
